ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. John E. Hall ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JOHN E. HALL, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal of British Columbia, effective on May 15, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
